string.text: What lies within the tomb: Follow Viper to obtain information
What lies within the tomb: Ask the stalkers or Sidorovich
What lies within the tomb: Check back with Viper again
What lies within the tomb: Find another way to get the loot
What lies within the tomb: Talk to Sidorovich
What lies within the tomb: Talk to Viper
What lies within the tomb: Follow Viper to the coordinates<
What lies within the tomb: Investigate the location at the coordinates
What lies within the tomb: Talk to Viper to return to the Cordon
What lies within the tomb: Return to the Rookie Village with Viper
What lies within the tomb: Inform Sidorovich about what happened
What lies within the tomb: Gather information about Atreo on your own
What lies within the tomb: Ask Vovan about Atreo
What lies within the tomb: Go North to speak with Duty
What lies within the tomb: Defend yourself against the Monolith
What lies within the tomb: Talk to Captain Kir again
What lies within the tomb: Return to inform Vovan
What lies within the tomb: Find another way to locate Atreo
Viper was in the truck with me. I should follow him until I get some information about the tomb.
Viper didn’t know much; it seems he hasn’t been in the area for quite some time. He told me to talk to the stalkers or, as a last resort, speak with Sidorovich.
I found this bizarre note, but there are only anti-radiation medicines left here. Someone took the artifact... Maybe Viper knows something about it.
Viper couldn’t help me... I need another way to track down the loot that belongs to me.
The local trader, Sidorovich, called me to talk with him. I should go see him.
The trader gave me the coordinates to track Atreo. I should go see Viper to check if he knows how to get there.
I have to follow Viper; he’ll guide me to the coordinates the trader gave me.
Looks like I found the missing stalkers... I need to search the area.
There’s no trace of the stash or of Atreo. Time to talk to Viper and head back to the Cordon.
I need to make it back to the village in one piece and inform Sidorovich about what happened...
I can’t wait for Sidorovich. I need to talk to the stalkers about Atreo...
Fanatic told me he knows someone who claims to know Atreo. I need to go talk to him and get some answers.
Vovan is injured. He said he’d tell me about Atreo if I do him a favor and check whether the Duty guys north of the Cordon have already opened the way.
Defend yourself against the Monolith!
Captain Kir called me in to talk. I should go see him.
I need to bring the bad news to Vovan. He’s waiting for me sick and wounded in his container.
Vovan doesn’t want to cooperate. I need to find another way to locate Atreo.
The stalker "Atreo": Go talk to "Rooster" the ex-Duty member.
Kir recommended that you go see "Rooster", a former Duty member who is now part of the scientists. It seems he was also looking for Atreo...
The stalker "Atreo": Confront Vovan
It turns out Vovan was Atreo. He had been pretending to be a stranger all this time. It was Rooster who broke his arm, not an anomaly.
The stalker "Atreo": Talk to Viper
Where am I?
The stalker "Atreo": Follow Atreos’ trail
Viper saved me from Atreos’ trick... I have to go after him. Some stalkers said he was heading east, past the bandits’ machine yard.
The stalker "Atreo": Investigate the area
What the hell happened here? I need to investigate a bit...
The stalker "Atreo": Talk to Viper
I need Viper’s help to figure out what to do next... Atreo headed east.
The stalker "Atreo": Find Atreo
Atreo left the Cordon and headed east... I need to figure out how to follow his trail without dying along the way.
The stalker "Atreo": Talk to Viper about Atreus
I don’t know where to go next. I should ask Viper what to do.
The stalker "Atreo": Get a bandit disguise
I need information, and around here the only ones who talk are the bandits. I’ll have to disguise myself as one of them.
The stalker "Atreo": Talk to the bandits about Atreo
I’ve got my bandit disguise. Now I need to find out whatever I can about Atreos’ whereabouts by talking to the bandits.
The stalker "Atreo": Earn Sultan’s favor
The bandit leader said he would help me if I complete a task given by Kolyan. I can’t go back empty-handed.
The stalker "Atreo": Talk to Sultán
I brought the Healer back and we took over the truck cemetery with Kashalot. It’s time to look for information from the bandit boss.
The stalker "Atreo": Get information from Sultan’s sentries
I need to look for Sultan’s sentries to see if they’ve noticed anything. He told them to cooperate.
The stalker "Atreo": Search for Atreo in the abandoned factory
Looks like he was seen entering the factory... Hunted by Monolith and surrounded by zombies. That won’t be easy.
The stalker "Atreo": Follow the Monolith trail
Viper said the Monolith must be tracking Atreo. I just have to follow their trail until I find him.
The stalker "Atreo": Find Atreo
Everything points to Atreo going underground. This time, he won’t escape.
The stalker "Atreo": Hold out for 3 minutes
Atreus is plotting something. I need to hold out until he shows up and take what’s mine.
The stalker "Atreo": Kill him or talk to him?
It’s time to make a decision.
The Journey: Gather a team to cross Darkscape.
Atreo left, taking the artifact with him... Viper offered to help me chase him, but Darkscape is no man's land right now. \n We need to assemble a team.
Military Patches: Find 4 patches for Fanatic
Fanatic asked me to find 4 military patches for an infiltration job.
Military Patches: Return to Fanatic
I must deliver the patches Fanatic asked for.
Thief's Task: Find the Stolen Explosives
Wolf needs me to find some explosives that were stolen from him, in the little house north of the train tracks. It seems the bandits store things there.
Thief's Task: Return to Wolf
I have to return the explosives to Wolf.
The Hideout Owner: Talk to Wolf
It seems they have located the thief, I need to talk to wolf to give a hand with that.
The Hideout Owner: Finish off the Mage
The thief seems well equipped, they call him "Mage". Need to find him on the train tracks.
The Hideout Owner: Find the PDA and return to Wolf
We took care of the thief, now we need to go back to wolf.
Mage's Orders: Go to Wolf
It seems the Mage kept causing trouble even after death... I have to go see Wolf.
Mage's Orders: Eliminate the bandits
Wolf has already given the order. We need to liquidate those bandits.
Mage's Orders: Talk to Wolf
We've taken care of everyone, I need to make sure Wolf is okay.
Rooster's Task: Enter the Anomaly
Rooster asked me for help with his anomaly study. He needs me to get in among the wooden crates and the rusted metal debris.
Rooster's Task: Follow Rooster's Instructions
I must go to the next anomaly.
I've already checked all the anomalies. I must return to Rooster for a reward.
Atreo's Trail, Viper's Suit: Find the Special Suit
It seems Atreo was hiding Viper's armor. I need to go find it on the roofs of the Machine Yard.
Atreo's Trail, Viper's Suit: Return the Special Suit
I found the suit that Atreo stole from Viper; it looks very pricey, I should get it back to him as soon as possible.
Atreo's Trail, Fanatic's Money: Find the Money
Atreo had hidden Fanatic's money in the abandoned van on the farm.
Atreo's Trail, Fanatic's Money: Return the Money
I found a briefcase in the van; it must be Fanatic's money.
Atreo's Trail, Rooster's Gear: Talk to Sidorovich
Atreo said he sold Rooster's gear to Sidorovich. I hope it won't cost me too much to get them back.
Atreo's Trail, Rooster's Gear: Eliminate the Strange Mutant
For Sidorovich to cooperate about Rooster's gear, I need to eliminate a strange mutant that has been causing trouble...
Atreo's Trail, Rooster's Gear: Return to Sidorovich
I've already dealt with the mutant; it definitely wasn't a "angry pig". I need to go back to the old man.
Atreo's Trail, Rooster's Gear: Go See Xenotech
It seems Sidorovich sold the gear to Xenotech, the Cordón technician. I have to go find them...
Atreo's Trail, Rooster's Gear: Return the Gear
I finally got the devices, although it seems Xenotech got angry... I need to go see Rooster.
Atreo's Trail, Screw's Artifacts: Talk to Kolyan in the Dark Valley
Atreo seems to have sold Screw's artifacts to a guy named Kolyan, a bandit in the Dark Valley. I have to go see him, for Screw.
It seems the Rookie's comrades have played a heavy prank on him. He asked me to find his weapon that they hid... It shouldn\'t be far.
Heavy Prank: Find the Rookie's Weapon
I've already found the weapon... His comrades are bastards.
Heavy Prank: Return the Weapon to the Rookie
The Rookie asked me as a personal favor to look for his friend "Screw", a well-known artifact hunter he couldn't locate.
Personal Favor: Find "Screw"
The worst happened; Screw is dead... I need to decide what to do with his PDA; it contains valuable information.
Personal Favor: Decide What to Do with Screw's PDA
Paranormal Encounter: Accompany Dogo to Find His Weapon
It seems some ghosts attacked Dogo while he was returning to the Cordon from the North. I need to go find the weapon he lost amid the chaos.
Paranormal Encounter: Destroy the Source of the Ghosts.
There really are ghosts! Dogo panicked! What do I do?
Paranormal Encounter: Aid Dogo and Escort Him to the Base.
Dogo was left wrecked. I have to take him to the base and talk to him later.
"Linda": Find Dogo's Modified PKM
I need to find Dogo's weapon, a Modified PKM. Dogo mentioned that Sidorovich trades information for bandit patches...
"Linda": Talk to Fanatic
Sidorovich sent me to talk to Fanatic
"Linda": Find the Modified PKM
Fanatic gave me very precise instructions and asked me not to hurt anyone. If it's about stealth, it'll be a piece of cake.
"Linda": Return His Weapon to Dogo
Finding the weapon wasn't easy, but I have it now. I need to return it to its owner.
The Hideout Owner: Talk to Tokha
A stalker from the rookie camp wants to talk to me...
The Hideout Owner: Find Hook
It seems Tokha was threatened, thinking he took the items from the hideout I looted... I have to find Hook.
Hook passed through Darkscape. Could it have been recently? I need to keep searching...
Medicine Train: Search the Hideout
Go to the radioactive locomotive to look for the medicines.
Ownerless Boxes: Search the Hideout
Go to the food container abandoned by the military.
Military Crates: Search the Hideout
Go to the outskirts of the military base to look for the smuggled suit.
Please, Captain: Get a Suit for the Rookie from Kir
Go see Kir and get him to give you a replacement suit for the Rookie. He will need it during the trip.
Take the suit back to the Rookie.
Find another way to obtain the suit.
Secondhand Tools: Find the Tools from the List
Xenotech can't properly upgrade the equipment without the missing tools. If I gather them, I can surely equip some upgrades.\n He needs: File, Axe, Double Wrench, Hammer, Shovel, Mace and Pickaxe.
Clear Sky Photo: Find the Photo's Owner
I found this photo of two friends from the Clear Sky faction. I hope I can return it to its owner.
Hounded by Dogs: Help Vovan Deal with the Dogs
Vovan doesn't want to talk; he has his own problems. If I help him with those dogs, maybe he'll give me a hand later.
Hounded by Dogs: Talk to Vovan Again
Those dogs are a thing of the past; now I need to ask Vovan some questions.
The bandits' box: Decide what to do with the box
I got a locked box after taking out the bandits, Viper told me that a guy named Nimble could help me with it.
I gave the box to Nimble and he asked me to go see the technician Xenotech to get the tools needed to open it.
I need to get 5,000 rubles to pay Xenotech for the tools and then be able to negotiate with Nimble.
I need to convince the merchant to help me with Xenotech; if I send him a message, Xenotech will probably give me the tools for free.
It seems the technician can open the box for a modest sum. I should ask Nimble for the box, open it, and keep all the contents.
I have already handed the box and tools to Nimble. I need to wait for him to take some time to open it so we can see what's inside.
This stalker came to say hi; I should talk to him.
First steps in the zone: Talk to Viper
Viper said he would teach me the basics about the place. I should follow him.
First steps in the zone: Follow Viper
It seems Viper saw a group of "Meats". I don't know what that is, but I should follow him to learn.
First steps in the zone: Eliminate the Meats group with Viper
Viper found something suspicious; I must follow him to see what it's about.
First steps in the zone: Follow Viper while he investigates
Take on the bandits with Viper
First steps in the zone: Accompany Viper to confront the bandits
Viper told me to chat for a while; I should see what he has to say.
First steps in the zone: Talk to Viper again
Search among Atreo's items for the Military frequencies for Sidorovich.
Military frequencies: Check Vovan/Atreo/Leto's items
Veterans' stuff: Check the chest in the attic
Sidorovich gave me information about a veterans' group's hideout. I must check the attic in the novice village
Veterans' stuff: Check the chest over the tunnel
These people seem to handle quality weapons. They have a vintar in the works; I need to check over the tunnel to Darkscape.
Veterans' stuff: Check the box in the wagon
I'm finding interesting things in these hideouts. It seems I need to check a wagon.
The journey: Talk to Viper before proceeding
I need to check how the team is doing with Viper.
The journey: Cross Darkscape without anyone dying
Everything is in order. I need to cross Darkscape, make sure no one dies, and follow the trail to Atreo.
The journey: Go see Trodnik, Viper's contact
We have news about Atreo. It seems a Viper contact ran into him and they captured him. We're about to go see him.
The journey: Find clues about what happened
This doesn't look good at all. Everyone is dead and zombified... I have to find out what happened at the farm before Atreo escapes.
The journey: Seek shelter in the Dark Valley
We need to follow Atreo to the Dark Valley and find out where he is.
The journey: Go take shelter at the farm
Viper says there's a farm further on in the Dark Valley. We must find a safe place to take refuge while we investigate.
The journey: Talk to Viper about the sniper
Rookie detected a sniper; I need to talk to Viper about it.
The journey: Run to the next tree
When I get the signal, I must reach the next tree.
The journey: Kill the sniper
I'm already in shooting range; I need to deal with the sniper.
Saving the Doctor: Talk to Kolyan
To earn the Sultan's favor, I must go to the north of the vehicle cemetery and rescue the bandits' doctor. \n First I need to see Kolyan for more information.
Saving the Doctor: Go to the truck cemetery
I have to go to that terrible place. Should I buy a shotgun with slugs as Kolyan recommended?
Saving the Doctor: Investigate the last coordinates where he was detected
Kolyan gave me the last coordinates where they saw the Butcher. I must find him.
Saving the Doctor: Take out the mutants
The doctor won't leave until I kill the mutants; I need to take care of that first.
I must escort this unsavory character alive to the Dark Valley.
Saving the Doctor: Return to the Dark Valley with the Butcher alive
I have already brought the Butcher back alive. I need to inform Kolyan.
Regaining control: Go ask Kashalot for some men
Kolyan wants me to lead the bandits through the truck cemetery. I need to ask a guy named Kashalot for men.
Regaining control: Go with Kashalot to the Truck Cemetery
Alright... Kashalot seems excited to come with us. We're going with him to find his men.
Regaining control: Capture the first point
We need to clear the first area.
Regaining control: Capture the second point
We need to clear the second area.
Regaining control: Capture the last point
We need to clear the last area.
Regaining control: Reject the monoliths' reinforcements
More are coming. We have to clear them all.
Regaining control: Talk to Kashalot
That was difficult. I need to talk to Kashalot now.
